_comment: This file contains default configuration settings for example_script.py. The structure of configuration files is: json_data[<object class name>][<argument name>] = <argument value>. To configure objects that are owned by other objects, use json_data[<parent object class name>][<child object class name>] = {<argument name> : <argument value>, ...}. All objects at lower levels inherit properties from objects at higher levels (e.g. all LoggingTool objects inherit properties from the first LoggingTool object)
